attributes.action: Introduce a law that brings politicians to justice if they lie in office
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Watching 'Why Democracy? Ministry of truth' on BBC 2 at 1900 on 11th Oct i was shocked to find out that Parliament is self regulating and that there is no law or independent body to hold politicians to account for lying in office. Industry, company boards, news papers, finance industry and even individuals can be taken to court for lying but our elected government can't. Make

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
